title: We have to use Credit Cards in America & Canada, sinful? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatu My question is, according to Islam, intercess is haram, but as a resident of Canada, we have to use our credit cards and most of our job is to do our credit cards because of the credit zone. So how do we balance this?
